title: Question:
author: Mwinami
content: Hellow members.Please  i am in need of 1000usd in btc and i will repay 1200 usd in btc after 2 weeks.please dm me first or send the direct in the adress below.1Ez1ePrQ9fsuNnLot5mCwFkpJ5sLQXHRDd

comments.author: Mwinami
comments.body: Hellow guys can you assist me the above requested loan

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: Mwinami on August 18, 2022, 05:57:54 PMPlease  i am in need of 1000usd in btc and i will repay 1200 usd in btc after 2 weeks.Quote from: Mwinami on August 19, 2022, 10:27:47 AMHellow guys can you assist me the above requested loanDo you have anything that can be used as collateral [refer to the "first two comments on this" thread] for this loan request?- While you're at it, you might want to also mention why you need this "specific" amount?

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: Mwinami on August 18, 2022, 05:57:54 PMHellow members.Please  i am in need of 1000usd in btc and i will repay 1200 usd in btc after 2 weeks.please dm me first or send the direct in the adress below.1Ez1ePrQ9fsuNnLot5mCwFkpJ5sLQXHRDdHow you're going to generate these 20% more for paying the loan? In just 2 weeks? it's 1/5 of your request!Why you are asking this to strangers on a online forum and don't you get directly from your friend/relatives (or just a bank/loan service in real life that will neve ask for such high interest?)Moreover, you have not any past transaction here hence no history of previous post ...no collateral!?!I don't think your is a reasonable offer

comments.author: Mwinami
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on August 20, 2022, 03:46:37 PMQuote from: Mwinami on August 18, 2022, 05:57:54 PMPlease  i am in need of 1000usd in btc and i will repay 1200 usd in btc after 2 weeks.Quote from: Mwinami on August 19, 2022, 10:27:47 AMHellow guys can you assist me the above requested loanDo you have anything that can be used as collateral [refer to the "first two comments on this" thread] for this loan request?- While you're at it, you might want to also mention why you need this "specific" amount?I need this loan so as to help me return home where i have kept me private keys in a paper.I am far away from home and i run short of money.once i got home i will repay the loan.

comments.author: Mwinami
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on August 20, 2022, 04:12:51 PMQuote from: Mwinami on August 18, 2022, 05:57:54 PMHellow members.Please  i am in need of 1000usd in btc and i will repay 1200 usd in btc after 2 weeks.please dm me first or send the direct in the adress below.1Ez1ePrQ9fsuNnLot5mCwFkpJ5sLQXHRDdHow you're going to generate these 20% more for paying the loan? In just 2 weeks? it's 1/5 of your request!Why you are asking this to strangers on a online forum and don't you get directly from your friend/relatives (or just a bank/loan service in real life that will neve ask for such high interest?)Moreover, you have not any past transaction here hence no history of previous post ...no collateral!?!I don't think your is a reasonable offer  I can handle my binance account as collateral

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Mwinami on August 21, 2022, 05:42:50 PMI need this loan so as to help me return home where i have kept me private keys in a paper.I am far away from home and i run short of money.once i got home i will repay the loan.Borrow money from a relative or friend, you have higher chances of getting helped from them than getting helped by someone here because nobody can trust someone with a brand-new account in the forum with a no collateral loanQuote from: Mwinami on August 21, 2022, 05:49:42 PMI can handle my binance account as collateral That is not considered collateral.
